uiw.mixin - MATLAB File Help
uiw.mixin
Contents of uiw.mixin package:

                AssignPVPairs - Mixin to assign PV pairs to public properties
DisplayNonScalarObjectAsTable - 
                  HasCallback - Mixin to provide a callback for a widget
                 HasContainer - Mixin class for a graphical widget container
              HasEditableText - Mixin for editable text field capabilities
         HasEditableTextField - Mixin for controls with a single editable text field
                 HasKeyEvents - Mixin to provide key events for a widget
        HasListSortingButtons - Mixin to provide list editing and ordering buttons
                    HasLogger - Mixin for classes that contain a Logger
               HasPreferences - Mixin class for managing app preferences
               HasValueEvents - Mixin to provide key events for a widget
